Abstract: Animal welfare campaigners and egg producers embrace Senate legislation aiding hens.
Snippet: Animal welfare campaigners and egg producers embrace Senate legislation aiding hens.
LeadParagraph: I love moments when common interests create accord between factions in our society that are otherwise deeply divided. Here’s some news along these lines in a joint release from the United Egg Producers and the Humane Society of the United States about a Senate bill that would, among other things, double the space allotted for each hen in the country’s massive egg industry:

Headline.Main: Something to Cluck About – A Bill Endorsed by Egg Producers and Animal Campaigners

Keywords.Name: organizations
Keywords.Value: Humane Society of the United States
